main.bio: I recently graduated the University of Pennsylvaniaâ€™s Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp. After gaining unique experiences in multiple industries over the past 8 years I decided that web development and data analysis best fit my skillset and passion for always learning. The Penn LPS bootcamp provided me with a 6 month, deep dive into the MERN stack, with a focus on teamwork in a remote environment and creative problem solving.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to email me if you would like to work together or just to say hi.

education.description: A 24 week long bootcamp dedicated to designing and building web applications. Skills learned include HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Node.js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, and React.

skills.name: Bootstrap

skills.name: NodeJs

skills.name: Heroku
